snippet: Msgr. Gerald Ryan, 92, New York City’s oldest working priest, has been a quiet force behind his Bronx community, and retirement is not in his vocabulary.
abstract: Profile of Msgr Gerald Ryan, who is New York City's oldest working priest at 92 years old; Ryan, who does not plan on retiring, is representative of the fact that on average Roman Catholic priests in the United States are much older than in decades past, and many more priests are working past 75, the formal retirement age under canon law.
lead_paragraph: Msgr. Gerald Ryan, 92, New York City’s oldest working priest, has been a quiet force behind his Bronx community, and retirement is not in his vocabulary.

headline.seo: At 92, Gerald Ryan Is New York City’s Oldest Working Priest
headline.main: In Graying Priesthood, New York’s Grayest Keeps Faith in Bronx
headline.print_headline: In Graying Priesthood, New York’s Grayest Keeps Faith in Bronx
